meanings.sent1: The teacher explained that the moduli of the numbers were all different.
meanings.sent2: The moduli of the equations were calculated to find the average value.
meanings.sent3: The moduli decided to throw a party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The moduli stood out in the crowd like colorful gems.
meanings.sent5: The moduli, like a team of superheroes, each had their own special power.

meanings.sent1: The moduli in the warehouse were neatly stacked and labeled.
meanings.sent2: Each moduli contained essential components for the project.
meanings.sent3: The moduli on the shelf played hide and seek with the workers.
meanings.sent4: The moduli fit together perfectly, like pieces of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The moduli, like building blocks, formed the foundation of the structure.
